channel.description: Welcome to the George "Bud" LaVezzi (785) 532-7767 2166 Engineering Hall gblavezz1 AT ksu DOT edu Other Instructors & TAs Russell Feldhausen Francesco Maiorana Dr. Scott DeLoach Dr. Josh Weese Nathan Bean GTA: Farrukh Ali GTA: BreAnn Anshutz Please use email (cc210-help or cc210-help@ksuemailprod.onmicrosoft.com) for all course communication Image Credit: Codio Course Structure ~12-15 Modules per Course Tutorial, Quiz, Project Gated - Must Complete in Order ~1 Module Each Week Work Around your Schedule Automated Grading Module 0 - Introduction Navigating Canvas & Codio Syllabus Where to Get Help Plagiarism Extra Credit Course Readiness Quiz Syllabus Contract Between Teacher & Student Read Carefully Ask Questions Diversity Statement Netiquette Subject to Change Late Work Each Module has a Due Date Complete ALL Work in Module Date = Confirmation Quiz Penalty = 100% of Project Points Still Must Complete Module Don't Get Behind!
